setGhostStone

public void setGhostStone(GoColor color)
Set a shadow stone at this field. A shadow stone is a stone which is drawn with some transparency. It can be used to display stones which are not part of the current board position (e.g. search variations)

Parameters:
color - The color of the shadow stone or null to remove a shadow stone.
